description: house shape; chimney is coin slot; decals in orange, gold and black overall; pictures of 2 buildings on one long side, children on opposite long side and doorway on one short end;
inscription:
Inscription

on both sides of roof, in gold rimmed with black: [THE CRUSADE OF RESCUE/ HOMES FOR/ DESTITUTE CHILDREN]
markings:
Label

on label on bottom, in pencil and ink: [THIS BOX IS ENTRUSTED TO/ M(?) JONES. (losses to label, partially illegible)]
object_name: "Crusade of Rescue Homes for Destitute Children" still bank
title: "Crusade of Rescue Homes for Destitute Children" still bank
